name: killer7
description: Sneak into a world of underground assassins as Harman Smith, a man who manifests 7 deadly personalities, the killer7. Take control of this distinct murderers' row as they hunt down the sinister Kun Lan to thwart his plan of world dominance.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: 2GHz Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: 3GHz Dual Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB, Dedicated Graphics Card DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space
